raw.title: [BIP-598] Claim Extra Safe Airdrop
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
# Payload with PR

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/920


# Abstract


[GIP-64](https://snapshot.org/#/gnosis.eth/proposal/0xd9dbc0cebba7b9a27f6fa3f30987b89b4dd50140ee3e21624ebc9bdb16049654) prompted GnosisDAO to distribute an additional portion of the SAFE supply, aimed at promoting decentralisation on the Gnosis Chain. In the context of a [token swap agreement](https://snapshot.org/#/balancer.eth/proposal/0x8d4969e56fa8eb13abc7a3404b3d42fe6b4afa1c7f29111bd012314f093a2fd2), Balancer DAO received GNO tokens from GnosisDAO, which were then locked in the [LGNO locking contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x4f8ad938eba0cd19155a835f617317a6e788c868). This deposit qualifies the Balancer DAO for these additional benefits, as it satisfies the requirement of having "GNO in locking contracts on Ethereum and Gnosis Chain." The current proposal aims to claim 119,196.473 Safe tokens, receiving them in the  [Balancer DAO treasury](https://etherscan.io/address/0x10a19e7ee7d7f8a52822f6817de8ea18204f2e4f).


# Specification

The DAO Multisig on Ethereum Mainnet ```0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f``` will interact with the SAFE contract at ```0x20cF5bA8aBA68Cd7Ca3d0cAfAc54dA807c772418``` and write the claim function for the total amount allocated, passing 
  
```"0xe3f30724dc7b68f4dc7bef54b812e18454d9b9b278887f4f09de5ee8dd2fbb97"```                                        ,                                                                                      ```"0x403b039b300b5d3f14f5a95011807ad1f279c31b5c6668e9dad1cbd43d5d9271"```                                         ,                                                 ```"0x25ddc11367cfc9aeab1086adcc396ffdaeb90e491021ab488fcacd43037cd4e6"```                                        ,                                                                                                  ```"0xc2628e8800f0dbbce626dcf83c09a30a5a97d79413dcb79ca32a75d3cc1e66b8"```                                        ,
```"0x933f0c6611414cc50cc739051a4e8140ca04f4ca6113746cedf8e9174aa9a6df"]```

for the ```merkleProof``` argument, and ```119196472786989781864064``` for the ```amountAllocated``` argument.

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-621] Lock SAFE balance
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
# Payload with PR: 
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1026

Simulation on Tenderly: [https://dashboard.tenderly.co/public/safe/safe-apps/simulator/fe1a6755-4c38-4974-a3fa-ff9488dbe405](https://dashboard.tenderly.co/public/safe/safe-apps/simulator/fe1a6755-4c38-4974-a3fa-ff9488dbe405) 

# Abstract

In [BIP-598](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-598-claim-extra-safe-airdrop/5723/1), we proposed claiming 119,196.47 SAFE tokens, which increased the Balancer DAO Treasury balance to 124,374.16 SAFE (valued at $228k at the time of writing). These SAFE tokens were claimable due to GNO generated through the GnosisDAO <> Balancer DAO [token swap agreement](https://snapshot.org/#/balancer.eth/proposal/0x8d4969e56fa8eb13abc7a3404b3d42fe6b4afa1c7f29111bd012314f093a2fd2). The GNO was subsequently locked into the LGNO locking contract, following a suggestion made by Karpatkey at that time.

Similarly, for the current proposal we suggest locking the SAFE balance in the [Balancer DAO multisig](https://etherscan.io/address/0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f)  into a reward booster created by SAFE.

This is a locking mechanism built by [Safe {pass}](https://safe.global/pass) that will earn more points the sooner the SAFE is locked, and the longer it’s locked for.  With a declining multiplier, season 1 of this reward mechanism ends September 30th.

 
![lock-chart.png](ipfs://bafkreif5gkjgzu7a6a4u32zqqivvntij4e4b6tuvmk7ace3krboaqarwtm)
    

Rewards based on the point structure is yet to be defined by the Safe team, but could consist of:


* Sponsored transactions: ability to send a limited amount of free transactions.
* SAFE tokens: earn yield on locked SAFE. 

For the current balance of SAFE in the Balancer DAO multisig, the rewards multiplier [is at 1.90x](https://app.safe.global/apps/open?safe=eth:0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f&appUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.safe.global).

 
![timelock.png](ipfs://bafkreigcx5capjcdpoawpsexmevhw5x3jfey4rnm2oojif7ryd6kgispvi)
    

Regarding potential risks, we don't foresee a greater impact in locking the tokens compared to holding SAFE idle in the DAO multisig.

# Specification

The DAO Multisig on Ethereum Mainnet ```0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f``` will execute the payload provided in the PR. This payload contains two transactions:



* Approval of the [locking contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x0a7CB434f96f65972D46A5c1A64a9654dC9959b2) to interact with the DAO’s SAFE balance.
* Write the ```Lock``` function with ```124374160017847396583275``` for the ```amount``` argument.

choices: No, this is not the way

cleaned.title: [BIP-666] Provide Balancer DAO POL to CoWAMM Pools
cleaned.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516

raw.title: [BIP-666] Provide Balancer DAO POL to CoWAMM Pools
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1196

## Summary
Authors: @Mike_B, @Xeonus 

In this proposal, we aim to formalize the launch requirements for CoWAMM’s for Balancer. This includes the following:

* Transfer $250k in BAL for discretionary incentives
* Transfer $250k in BAL + $250k in WETH to seed the BAL/WETH CoWAMM pool for a total of $500k
* Transfer $125k in USDC and $125k in WETH to seed Balancer DAO’s portion of the USDC/WETH pool for a total of $250k

For a total of 

**$500k in BAL**, **$125k USDC**, and **$375k in WETH**

## Motivation

This proposal serves to formalise the execution of the approved obligations outlined in [BIP-628](https://forum.balancer.fi/t/bip-628-balancer-cow-protocol-strategic-partnership-launching-cowamm-pools/5813) as at the time of BIP-628’s writing, the smart contracts had yet to be finalized. The execution only includes the provisioning of POL and not any token swap agreements so far.

## Execution Specification

For the sake of simplicity and not having to specify join parameters (which can vary depending on asset pricing), the entirety of these funds will be sent to the LM multisig at 0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860

Price of BAL: $2.34
Price of WETH: $3171

||Amount ($)|BAL|USDC|WETH|
|---|---|---|---|---|
|BAL Incentives|$250,000.00|106837.61|0.00|0.00|
|USDC/WETH Pool|$250,000.00|0.00|125000.00|39.42|
|BAL/WETH Pool|$500,000.00|106837.61|0.00|78.84|

This comes to a total of

**125,000 USDC**
**213675.21 BAL**
**118.26 WETH**

After which, the appropriate funds will be added to the corresponding CoWAMM pool after which the LP tokens will be transferred back to the DAO multisig.

This proposal will fulfill all our obligations outlined by BIP-628.

## Technical Specification
The DAO multisig `0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f` will interact with USDC at `0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48` by writing transfer, passing `0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` as recipient and the amount 125000 as `125000000000`. 
The DAO multisig `0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f` will interact with BAL at `0xba100000625a3754423978a60c9317c58a424e3D` by writing transfer, passing `0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` as recipient and the amount 213675.21 as 213675210000000000000000.
Finally, the DAO multisig `0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f` will interact with WETH at `0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2` by writing transfer, passing `0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` as dst and the amount 118.26 as 181260000000000000000 at wad.

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-454] Claim Second SAFE Airdrop
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
# PR With Payload

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/553

# Tenderly Simulation

https://dashboard.tenderly.co/public/safe/safe-apps/simulator/c1c80f66-050b-4f82-94d2-c97ab868079a

# Motivation

The [passing of Safe DAO's SEP-5](https://snapshot.org/#/safe.eth/proposal/0xb4765551b4814b592d02ce67de05527ac1d2b88a8c814c4346ecc0c947c9b941) resulted in new allocations for existing $SAFE holders. [The Balancer DAO multisig is such a holder](https://etherscan.io/token/0x5afe3855358e112b5647b952709e6165e1c1eeee?a=0x10A19e7eE7d7F8a52822f6817de8ea18204F2e4f).

# Urgency

**NOTE**: in order to successfully claim this second airdrop, the vesting needs to be created before 2023-10-27T10:00:00 UTC ([ref](https://etherscan.io/address/0xC0fde70A65C7569Fe919bE57492228DEE8cDb585#code#F1#L53))!

# Specification

Payload consists of three calls:

- `Airdrop2.redeem`: this creates a vesting for the `msg.sender`
- `Airdrop2.claimVestedTokensViaModule`: this claims the $SAFE tokens already vested. By passing a `max(uint128)` we claim all available tokens
- `Airdrop1.claimVestedTokensViaModule`: idem, but claim pending tokens from the vesting created during the initial airdrop

This results in two transfers to the multisig totalling to roughly 2000 $SAFE.

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: Proposal to claim vested COW tokens and transfer them to the BalancerDAO multisig, supported unanimously by voters and neutrally discussed in forum.
key_arguments_for: Unanimous voter support for claiming vested tokens
Proposal secures valuable assets already vested to the DAO
Forum sentiment neutral, no opposition detected
Historical similar proposals indicate procedural token management
key_arguments_against: Past similar proposals showed negative post-vote token price and TVL impacts, suggesting caution
No strong community concerns raised, but market reaction history advises monitoring

evidence.quote: 2 forum comments with neutral sentiment, no opposition or strong support expressed.
All 5 votes are for 'Yes, let's do it' with high voting power.
Similar proposals passed with unanimous support but showed post-vote token price and TVL declines.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Unanimous voting and timeline metrics strongly support claiming the vested COW tokens.
- Forum discussion is neutral, showing no opposition or concern, indicating community acceptance.
- Historical lessons from similar proposals suggest potential market declines post-vote, but this proposal's nature as a token claim reduces associated risk.
- The recommendation aligns with the aggregated sentiment and maximizes the DAO's asset security and long-term benefit.
